name: Chromium
description: Chromium is the driven engine of Google's Chrome browser. Its purpose is to create a safe, stable and fast browser. It uses V8 engine exclusively developed by Google to improve the efficiency of JavaScript, but also designed sandbox, blacklist, incognito browsing and other functions to achieve a stable and secure web browsing environment.

en_US.description: Chromium is the driven engine of Google's Chrome browser. Its purpose is to create a safe, stable and fast browser. It uses V8 engine exclusively developed by Google to improve the efficiency of JavaScript, but also designed sandbox, blacklist, incognito browsing and other functions to achieve a stable and secure web browsing environment.
en_US.name: Chromium

zh_CN.description: Chromium是Google的Chrome浏览器驱动引擎，其目的是为了创建一个安全、稳定和快速的浏览器。它采用Google独家开发出的V8引擎以提升JavaScript的效率，而且还设计了沙盒、黑名单、无痕浏览等功能来实现稳定与安全的网页浏览环境。
zh_CN.name: Chromium
